project.name: J-C609A-CMUD-06-ST03-DT02-DF18-CF19-01
project.description: This weakness takes an input of "<qsize> <string>" where qsize is the length of the array to generate and sort for timing and string is an arbitrary string to use as data to pass around. The weakness uses a double checked lock to initialize a shared static data class in an attempt to be efficient (not block threads when the data is initialized) however this introduces a possibility for a thread to return from the method while another thread is in the process of initializing the data. This will lead to an access of uninitialized data, resulting in a StringIndexOutOfBoundsException. This malicious behavior is tiggered when qsize >= 5000000, and not to occur when qsize <= 50.

iopair.name: J-C609A-CMUD-06-ST03-DT02-DF18-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable defining string value.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="50 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo2 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo1 asdf" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
